attr.title: Vertical Drop Heroes HD
attr.desc: Vertical Drop Heroes is a procedural platformer RPG hybrid with roguelike elements, where your hero adventures through randomly generated stages. Armed with a variety of skills and traits, you must use your cunning and reflexes to survive the dangers of each stage.
attr.inst: Place game files on the ports/verticaldropheroeshd/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Place game files on the ports/verticaldropheroeshd/gamedata/ directory.
